about_the_game:
Original Sound Track for Aeternum by Jesse Bishop
Featuring two remix tracks by Viking Guitar and D34D!

1. To Eternity 02:36
2. Grassy Path To School 04:10
3. The Irritable Paintress 04:12
4. Hallway Escapade 04:06
5. The Shy Machinist 04:41
6. Among The Stacks 04:21
7. A Girl Of Wit And Satire 04:28
8. Auditorium Confrontation 01:27
9. Aspirations Of The Hapless Buccaneer 06:00
10. Locked Up 01:53
11. Stitch Witchery 04:20
12. From Eternity 04:05
13. Education 01:52
14. Fanfare To Spectacular Peril 01:25
15. Head Asplosion (unused) 05:27
16. VikingGuitar Feat. Stemage - Aspirations Of The Hapless Buccaneer (VikingGuitar fet. Stemage) 04:43
17. D34D - Fanfare To Spectacular Peril (D34D mix) 04:28
18. Art History 01:42
19. Engineering Fundamentals 01:36
20. Avant-Garde Literature 02:51
21. Basic Sailing Certification 01:16
